WRITING.TITLE: average battery life on a 'new' surface pro 2?
WRITING.TEXT: i bought a 'new' surface pro 2 from the staples 'clearance/sell off' a few weeks ago from slickdeals. i full wiped and fresh installed windows 10. all drivers are up to date. i have a type cover 2 plugged in. i get about 4 hours of use. i did a check and its a brand new battery. is this average? Maybe the battery lost its mojo sitting around for several years on the shelf in the back room of staples? I know Intel said they were working with microsoft on windows 10 battery life. I never used windows 8 on the surface long enough to really gauge if it had better battery on it. thanks for your responses!

WRITING.TITLE: Can't get 'Wireless Display' app to show work? Remove your virtualbox!
WRITING.TEXT: I have windows 8.1 and xbox wouldnt show up to miracast! Uninstalled Virtualbox (which removed virtual network drivers) and whala! Showed up instantly
Had the same problem and changed it to bridge, and accept all incoming. worked perfectly.
